Association of Salaried Medical Specialists: Doctor shortage in NZ leading to deteriorating patients, long waits in pain https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/association-of-salaried-medical-specialists-doctor-shortage-in-nz-leading-to-deteriorating- Patients-long-waits-in-pain/76VLXYCMEFH4XM6H337MMKIRQU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/association-of-salaried-medical-specialists-doctor-shortage-in-nz-leading-to-deteriorating- Patients-long-waits-in-pain/76VLXYCMEFH4XM6H337MMKIRQU/ Patients are going through months of pain due to enormous long hospital waitlists. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 07:28:25 +0000 Patients' health is deteriorating and doctors are leaving the public sector as hospital waitlists mushroom, creating a compounding problem, a doctors' union says. Photo / 123RF
Watch: Two offenders target Greenlane liquor store with an axe and hammer https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/watch-two-offenders-target-greenlane-liquor-store-with-an-axe-and-hammer/YNRGUJFMCRHAXGBNCXC6ALJFH4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/watch-two-offenders-target-greenlane-liquor-store-with-an-axe-and-hammer/YNRGUJFMCRHAXGBNCXC6ALJFH4/The offenders were caught a short time later.Sun, 04 Feb 2024 07:17:57 +0000 A staff member at a liquor store in the central Auckland suburb of Greenlane was hit with an axe before the offenders stole cigarettes and cash.
